page.title: 09RELIGION (THE RECTOR)
page.content: {Mr. Reed}the{Rector of Debden}has been ordained for 17 years. Part of his work involves visiting people in the village or in hospital. The rest of his time is taken up in going to{Carver Barracks,}meetings of the {Church Council}and writing sermons. He writes all his own services which take him between 1-5 hours each. Mr. Reed is the{Chairman of the {Governors}at{Debden C.of E. Primary {School}and he visits the school once a week to conduct an assembly. Apart from being the Rector of Debden, Mr. Reed is also{Vicar}of Wimbish,{Chaplain}of Carver Barracks and{Rural Dean}of Saffron Walden.
